buildCommand: echo "[vercel.json] VERCEL_ENV=$VERCEL_ENV VERCEL_URL=$VERCEL_URL" && if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = "preview" ]; then export NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL="https://$VERCEL_URL"; echo "[vercel.json] Set NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL=$NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL"; fi && cd ../.. && turbo run build --filter={apps/web}...
installCommand: cd ../.. && corepack enable && bash clone-marketing.sh && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
